title: Capstone Project
content: Can you recommend a capstone mentor who is supportive and extremely knowledgeable for CSE department?

comments.body: Which domains are you looking at? You can't pick a random prof. Needs to be relevant to your interests.
I know Prafullata is good but I do not know if there are other profs now
I think she is the only good CC professor as of now
Who are the other CC profs?
I think some assistant profs, Dont know names tbh. wait for someone in CS to answer

If you do capstone in cloud under Prafullata maam you can also take advice from KVS sir once in a while if your project domain aligns with his, ik a couple of teams doing that rn. So I think it's a solid choice.
Ah yes forgot about this. KVS is a chad, dude helps out once in a while. He's pretty friendly and in general a great prof who knows his field like the palm of his hand.
Is it okay if I approach them now itself or shld I wait till 6th sem
